results.title: Physical Activity, Sedentary Behavior, and Cancer Risk - Infographic - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Physical activity and sedentary behavior are associated with risk for post-menopausal breast, colorectal, and endometrial cancer. Scientists are searching for links to many other cancers; in particular, future studies may broaden the number of cancers linked to physical activity.

results.title: Cancer Types Studied in DCEG - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Cancer types studied by DCEG investigators: breast, bladder, blood cancers, bone marrow, brain, cervix, colon/rectum, endometrium, esophagus, familial cancer syndromes, gastrointestinal, head and neck, kidney, leukemia, liver, lymphoma, lung, melanoma, ovary, pancreas, prostate, stomach, thyroid, second cancers

results.title: Genetics of Radiation-related Non-cancer Diseases - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Dr. Catharine West presents an introduction to the genetics of radiation-related non-cancer diseases, such as cataracts, circulatory disease â€“ vascular damage, non-malignant respiratory and digestive diseases, and cognitive impairment. (Radiation Epidemiology and Dosimetry Course 2019)

results.title: Familial Testicular Cancer Study - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A study evaluating the role of testicular microlithiasis in familial testicular cancer

results.title: EBV-associated gastric cancer - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG studies of Epstein-Barr virus (EBV) and gastric cancer

results.title: Liver Cancer Pooling Project - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A liver cancer pooling project among existing U.S. cohorts in order to explore liver cancer etiology in a prospective manner

results.title: Somatic Studies on Kidney Cancer - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Tumor Profiling of Kidney Cancer Subtypes

results.title: Hepatitis Viruses and Liver Cancer - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Study of chronic hepatitis virus infection and the risk of liver cancer

results.title: Breast Cancer and Occupational and Environmental Exposures - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Studies to evaluate the possible role of occupational and environmental factors in the origin of breast cancer

results.title: Confluence project for breast cancer genetics - National Cancer Institute
results.description: The Confluence project will develop a large research resource by 2021 to uncover breast cancer genetics through genome-wide association studies.

results.title: Breast Cancer Tumor Characterization Studies - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Studies to understand how genetic and environmental risk factors are related to breast cancer tumor features and clinical progression.

results.title: Breast Cancer Among Asian Women - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Study of breast cancer study among Asian women, to identify molecular alterations in tumors and examine associations of molecular changes with risk factors.

results.title: Human Papillomavirus (HPV) Cervical Cancer Risk Prediction - National Cancer Institute
results.description: Human Papillomavirus (HPV) Cervical Cancer Risk Prediction

results.title: Case-control study of breast cancer in Poland - exposure assessment and biospecimen collection - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A population-based case-control study of breast cancer in Poland that combines state-of-the art techniques of exposure assessment and collection of biological specimens

results.title: Breast Cancer Detection Demonstration Project Follow-up Study - National Cancer Institute
results.description: A follow-up study of women who were participants in the Breast Cancer Detection Demonstration Project

results.title: DCEG Studies of Cancers of the Ovary - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG is conducting research on cancers of the ovary, also known as ovarian cancer.

results.title: DCEG Studies of Cancer of the Testes - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG is conducting research on cancer of the testes, also known as testicular cancer.

results.title: DCEG Studies of Lung Cancer - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG is conducting research on lung cancer.

results.title: DCEG Studies of Cancer of the Esophagus - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG is conducting research on cancers of the esophagus, also known as esophageal cancer.

results.title: DCEG Studies of Liver Cancer - National Cancer Institute
results.description: DCEG is conducting studies on liver cancer, including hepatocellular carcinoma
